page.title: 12Ipswich,a town near Kesgrave
page.content: Ipswich is quite a large town with a population of over 130,000. It lies at the head of the River Orwell. It has a dock where ships can load and unload their cargo. It also has a very good shopping centre and a large Town Hall. Ipswich has a First Division football team that has a very good football pitch. There are also many factories in Ipswich. Ransomes is an engineering firm and Churchmans makes cigarettes and cigars. Many of the people who live in the houses and bungalows in Kesgrave work in these factories. Two large insurance companies have their main offices in Ipswich, together employing about 3000 people. To the east of Ipswich is Rushmere Heath with its golf course which is in the Kesgrave area.
